text:
Gram Sabha meetings will be held in all village panchyats at 11 a.m. on February 26 to discuss sanitation programme, cattle disease preventive measures, Indira Gandhi housing scheme and national election day.

People should attend the meetings and give their valuable suggestions for the development of the panchayats, said Collector T.N. Hariharan in a press release here on Wednesday.
title: Gram sabha meetings on Friday
